sn15.19:1.2: “Mendicants, this transmigration has no known beginning.
sn15.19:1.3: No first point is found of sentient beings roaming and transmigrating, shrouded by ignorance and fettered by craving.
sn15.19:1.4: It’s not easy to find a sentient being who in all this long time has not previously been your daughter.
sn15.19:1.6: This transmigration has no known beginning.
sn15.19:1.7: No first point is found of sentient beings roaming and transmigrating, shrouded by ignorance and fettered by craving.
sn15.19:1.8: For such a long time you have undergone suffering, agony, and disaster, swelling the cemeteries.
sn15.19:1.9: This is quite enough for you to become disillusioned, dispassionate, and freed regarding all conditions.”
